messages.subject: Interrupting was Re: 11 is such a hard age
messages.msgSnippet: My dad s got 4 sisters, yentas all (check Fiddler on the Roof, the matchmaker character, for a sample) and us kids joked (to ourselves) that if you put all 4
messages.messageBody:
"My dad's got 4 sisters, yentas all (check Fiddler on the Roof, the
matchmaker character, for a sample) and us kids joked (to ourselves)
that if you put all 4 of them in a room, they could have at least 20
conversations all at the same time. As kids, we got really good at
being able to tune in and out of conversations so we could follow
the interesting ones (like Who wants to take the kids for ice
cream?) and ignore the boring ones (like Uncle Harry's sciatica is
flaring up again)."

Haha!

Alysia


---------------------------------
Never miss a thing. Make Yahoo your homepage.
